acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.champion: Address of the league champion's manager

params.cleanSheets: Number of clean sheets to reward

params.topScorer: Address of the top scorer's manager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.isDraw: True if the match ended in a draw
params.manager1Won: True if manager1 won (ignored if isDraw)
params.matchId: Unique match identifier (keccak256 of season + matchday + teams)

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

distributeCleanSheetBonus(bytes32,addres.notice: Distribute clean sheet bonus to a goalkeeper's manager

setSENSIToken(address).notice: Update the SENSI token contract address

settleMatch(bytes32,address,address,bool.notice: Settle a match and distribute rewards

settledMatches(bytes32).notice: Track settled matches to prevent double-settlement
